DOC.brief_summary: The intention of this trial is to evaluate safety and efficacy of a combination treatment of EndoTAG-1 with Gemcitabine versus Gemcitabine monotherapy.
DOC.brief_title: EndoTAG-1 / Gemcitabine Combination Therapy to Treat Locally Advanced and/or Metastatic Adenocarcinoma of the Pancreas
DOC.criteria: Inoperable adenocarcinoma of the pancreas Histologic or cytologic confirmation At least 18 years of age Any chemotherapeutical treatment for pancreatic adenocarcinoma before enrollment Major surgery within 4 weeks prior to enrollment Major cardiovascular disease
